availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Burns (Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Jane Melvin in December 1838. Father of Emily Burns, Serepttia Burns, Mary Burns, John A. Burns and Harriett E. Burns. Farmer in Bracken County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 392B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 182-83.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Berlin Precinct, p. 300B.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, File #000344098, Bracken County, December 11, 1838.
